prompt: Drag the form elements into place to fill out the form. Drag either a selected or unselected icon to each radio button and check box.
description: Fill out the following newsletter sign-up form for Jean Smart, who is interested in sewing. Jean’s email address is js5551234@email.com and she wants to get an html formatted newsletter.
feedback: Filling out this form is pretty simple. In the name area, enter the name, “Jean Smart.” In the email address area, type the email address: js5551234@email.com. You also need to check the box for “sewing.” and select the “html” email format radio button. The other check box and radio button should be unselected.
